skills.name: Solar Cleave
skills.description: You channel Solaria into your weapon, unleashing a radiant strike that sears the air and staggers foes.

effect.core: Deal 2 Harm to a single enemy in melee range and sear them with radiant energy.

examples: Blazing Edge — Convert Harm to Fire; apply Burn (per tag compatibility).
Crescent Sweep — Change target from 1 enemy → up to 3 enemies in a melee arc.
Lunge — Gain 1 hex of movement immediately before the strike.

narrative: Ignite torches or briefly dispel mundane darkness with the radiant edge.
Shear ropes, branches, or brittle obstacles with a wide, empowered sweep.

skills.name: Veil of Sunlight
skills.description: A shimmering veil of Solaria cloaks your allies, bending light to mislead enemies.

effect.core: All allies within 2 hexes gain Disadvantage on being targeted until the start of your next turn.

examples: Radiant Ward — Add 1 temporary Harm shield to protected allies.
Sun Mirage — Enemies must succeed on an extra check to identify protected targets.
Lingering Veil — Extend effect duration by 1 round.

narrative: Momentarily dazzle or confuse a group of pursuers in blinding light.
Conceal the approach of allies during negotiations or ambushes.

skills.name: Trailblazer
skills.description: You clear the way forward, cutting through obstacles and finding safe paths.

effect.core: Reduce the movement cost of your party by 1 per hex for this turn, and ignore one hazardous terrain effect.

examples: Pathfinder’s Instinct — Reveal hidden paths or shortcuts on the hex map.
Clear Passage — Remove a single physical barrier (fallen tree, rubble, thorns).
Momentum — Gain +1 movement hex immediately after use.

narrative: Hack a way through jungle undergrowth or tangled vines.
Lead pack animals safely across treacherous ground.
